Body: I made a new pattern lock at my device. However, I forgot my pattern lock. When I  tried the "forgot pattern" procedure, it ask me to sign in to my google mail account. But, when I'm sign in using my google mail account, I still cannot unlock it. It says the invalid password or username. My brother told me it cannot log in my Google Mail account because I don't have any internet access or mobile data. I'm unable to turn on my Wifi connection  or mobile data because I cannot pass through the "forgotten" pattern.
Title: pattern forgot no wifi

history.Text: I made a new pattern lock at my device. (cellphone) soon, I totally forgot my pattern lock. When I  tried the "forgot pattern", it ask me to sign in to my google mail account. but, when I`m sign in using my google mail account, I still cannot unlock it. it says the invalid password or username. My brother told me it cannot log in my google mail account because I don`t have any internet access and mobile data. i was unable to turn on my Wifi connection  or mobile data because i cannot pass through the "forgotten" pattern.

I made a new pattern lock at my device. However, I forgot my pattern lock. When I  tried the "forgot pattern" procedure, it ask me to sign in to my google mail account. But, when I'm sign in using my google mail account, I still cannot unlock it. It says the invalid password or username. My brother told me it cannot log in my Google Mail account because I don't have any internet access or mobile data. I'm unable to turn on my Wifi connection  or mobile data because I cannot pass through the "forgotten" pattern.
